Package com.sympos2.repositories

Interface ObraRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Obra,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Obra,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Obra,Long>, org.springframework.data.mongodb.repository.MongoRepository<Obra,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Obra,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Obra>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Obra,Long>
public interface ObraRepository extends org.springframework.data.mongodb.repository.MongoRepository<Obra,Long>
This interface manages the Obra objects from database.
Version:
0.1.0
Author:
KurixDeCuatroCuernos

  • Method Details

    • findByIsbn

      Optional<Obra> findByIsbn(Long isbn)
      This method finds an Obra object from database by its id (in this case isbn).
      Parameters:
      isbn - Long with the Obra's id.
      Returns:
      returns an Optional object, it contains an Obra object if founds one, or empty Optional if not.

    • deleteByIsbn

      Optional<Obra> deleteByIsbn(Long isbn)
      This method deletes an Obra object from database by its id (in this case isbn).
      Parameters:
      isbn - Long with the Obra's id.
      Returns:
      returns an Optional object, it contains an Obra object if founds one, or empty Optional if not.

    • findOneByOrderByCreatedAtDesc

      @Query(value="{}", sort="{\'createdAt\': -1}") List<Obra> findOneByOrderByCreatedAtDesc()
      This method returns the last Obra object inserted in database.
      Returns:
      returns a sorted List of Obra object, it contains Obra objects if finds one or more, or empty if not.

    • findByAutorAndTituloAndFechaPublicacion

      Optional<Obra> findByAutorAndTituloAndFechaPublicacion(String autor, String titulo, LocalDate fechaPublicacion)
      This method finds a Obra object from database by its author, title and publication date.
      Parameters:
      autor - String with the author's name.
      titulo - String with the title of the Obra object to find.
      fechaPublicacion - LocalDate with the publication date of the Obra object to find.
      Returns:
      returns an Optional object, it contains an Obra object if founds one, or empty Optional if not.

    • findAllByFechaPublicacion

      List<Obra> findAllByFechaPublicacion(LocalDate fechaPublicacion)
      This method finds all Obra objects in database by its publication date.
      Parameters:
      fechaPublicacion - LocalDate with the publication date of the Obra object to find.
      Returns:
      returns a List of Obra object if founds one or more, or is empty if not.

    • findByIsbnOnlyTituloAndAutor

      @Query(value="{}", fields="{titulo:1, Autor:1}") Optional<Obra> findByIsbnOnlyTituloAndAutor(Long isbn)
      This method finds an Obra object from database by its id (isbn), but only shows its title and author.
      Parameters:
      isbn - Long with the Obra's id.
      Returns:
      returns an Optional object, it contains an Obra object if founds one, or empty Optional if not.

    • findAllByTitleOnlyTituloAndAutor

      @Query(value="{}", fields="{titulo:1, Autor:1}") List<Obra> findAllByTitleOnlyTituloAndAutor(String titulo)
      This method finds all the Obra objects in database by its title, but only shows its title and author.
      Parameters:
      titulo - String with the title of the Obra object to find.
      Returns:
      returns a List of Obra object if founds one or more, or is empty if not.

    • findAllIsbnAndTitulo

      @Query(value="{}", fields="{ \'isbn\': 1, \'titulo\' : 1}") List<ObraIsbnTituloProjection> findAllIsbnAndTitulo()
      This method finds all the Obra objects in database but only shows its id (isbn) and title.
      Returns:
      returns a List of Obra object if founds one or more, or is empty if not.

      @Query(value="{}", fields="{ \'isbn\': 1 }") List<Obra> findAllOnlyIsbn()
      This method finds all the Obra objects in database but only shows its id (isbn).
      Returns:
      returns a List of Obra object if founds one or more, or is empty if not.

    • findAllParams

      @Query("{ \'$or\': [ { \'isbn\': { \'$regex\': ?0, \'$options\': \'i\' } }, { \'titulo\': { \'$regex\': ?0, \'$options\': \'i\' } }, { \'autor\': { \'$regex\': ?0, \'$options\': \'i\' } }, { \'tipo\': { \'$regex\': ?0, \'$options\': \'i\' } }, { \'abstracto\': { \'$regex\': ?0, \'$options\': \'i\' } }, { \'lugar_publicacion\': { \'$regex\': ?0, \'$options\': \'i\' } }, { \'editorial\': { \'$regex\': ?0, \'$options\': \'i\' } } ] }") List<Obra> findAllParams(String search)
      This method finds all the Obra objects in database by any coincidence with the search input.
      Parameters:
      search - String with the input to find any coincidence.
      Returns:
      returns a List of Obra object if founds one or more, or is empty if not.
